headline: How The Old Dominion Freight Line ODFL Story Is Shifting As Analysts Rework Expectations
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line’s fair value estimate has just been nudged to US$167.79 from US$167.17, a tiny shift that still matters because it reflects how analysts are weighing long term execution against mixed views on freight demand and valuation. The update sits inside a broader spread of research targets between roughly US$138 and US$196, with opinions stretching from Buy to Sell as analysts debate how resilient pricing and volumes could be over the next few years. As these targets move...
